灦灦灦

灦字的基本解释

灦
xiǎn
〔灦涣〕（水）深而清澈，如“混瀚灦灦，流映扬焆。”

灦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǎn］
［《集韻》呼典切，上銑，曉。］
［《集韻》馨甸切，去霰，曉。］
见“灦焕”。

灦字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灦； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页664第21
【集韻】呼典切，音顯。【玉篇】水也。一曰灦渙，水貌。【郭璞·江賦】混瀚灦渙。【註】水勢淸深而澄徹光明也。　又【集韻】馨甸切，音韅。義同。

灦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
灦字的起名意思

暂无。

Hu
Basic explanation of words
Hu
xiǎn
〔灦涣〕(The water) is deep and clear, as in "Hun Han 灦灦, flow reflected Yang Yan."
Hu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǎn］
["Jiyun" Calling Dian cut, milling, Xiao. ]
["Ji Yun" Xindian cut, go to ha, Xiao. ]
See "Xi Huan".
Hu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　灦; Kangxi strokes: 27; page number: page 664 21
[Jiyun] Calling Dianqie, the sound is obvious. [Jade articles] Water also. One said Qi Huan, water appearance. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Hun Han Xihuan. [Note] The water is deep and clear and bright.　[Jiyun] Xindian cut, sound 韅. The same meaning.
